name: Virgin Games
tag_list: games, gaming, casino, poker, bingo, mobile-casino
overview:
Founded in 2004 and wholly owned by Richard Branson’s Virgin Group, Virgin Games is an online gaming company operating the Virgin Bingo, Virgin Casino, Virgin Mobile Casino and Virgin Poker brands.

Virgin Casino (http://www.virgingames.com/casino) was launched in 2004 and offers over 250 games from 10+ software suppliers, with more games added every week.

Virgin Bingo (http://www.virgingames.com/bingo) launched in May 2005 and is now one of the leading UK bingo websites. Virgin Bingo is home to traditional 75, 80 and 90 ball Bingo, as well as hundreds of slot games, instant win and side games.

Virgin Poker (http://www.virgingames.com/poker), part of the International Poker Network (IPN) was launched in 2004 and is a fun, entertaining and trustworthy place to play poker online.

Virgin Mobile Casino (http://m.virgingames.com/) was launched in December 2012 and allows punters to play slot, roulette, blackjack and bingo games on the move. The mobile casino is integrated to Virgin Games’ single wallet system allowing players to use the same account to play on web or mobile.

Licensed in both Alderney and Malta, Virgin Games has achieved exemplary standards in player protection and social responsibility and has been awarded the GamCare Certification for Remote Gambling.

offices.address2: 2nd Floor, The Yellow Building, 1 Nicholas Road
